Decontamination

Decontamination Items must be cleaned first.

Low-level decontamination : bleach/70% alcohol and chlorhexidine. (kills most bacteria, some fungi, some viruses)

High-level disinfection : aldehydes, chlorine dioxide. Kills almost everything, not spores.

Sterilisation : autoclaving/ gamma irradiation. Kills everything. Does not destroy prions.
